archimate:Principle.name: Tietoevry Connect Principles
archimate:Principle.documentation:
Principles are a core part of architecture design in TOGAF. Further information: https://pubs.opengroup.org/architecture/togaf9-doc/arch/chap20.html
Developed in Spring 2021 by the CIEA Team & Esa Kauppi, Head of Business Architecture. Approved by Petteri Uljas, Head of Business Transformation, Operations and Architecture in June 2021. Modelled and in effect as of 26.08.2021.
2022-03-28 These principles have been confirmed to be approved as is, for the new Tietoevry connect organization.
